trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Honesdale
There were no other sightings in Honesdale on or around September 10th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were driving to her house from town and she lives in the middle of no where.. We look up and see 6 bright, hovering, diagonal lights in the sky. As we proceeded to drive it was exactly above us at one point, and it still didn't move. The lights weren't unusually bright but it was weird that the object just stayed in one place and didn't move at all.
Summary: My friend and I were driving to her house and we look up in the sky and see a hovering object with 6 diagonal lights.
